section2.text: Dark sophisticated tones or bright overspilling highlights can be seen with change in sunlight. The light sensitive paint transitions from black to red to yellowish orange throughout the day.

section3.title: The flagship exterior design boasts breathtaking beauty and details.

list1.title: 3D Flawless Halo Lights
list1.text: The halo brings happiness to the family. The uniform, coherent, and gentle no-breakpoint design is a real piece of art.

list2.title: Sculptural Character Lines
list2.text: The contour is full of volume, and the side design visually connects the front face and the robust rear with smooth side curves and clear lines.

list3.title: Rounded Rear Design
list3.text: A more agile overall shape, a more dynamic stance, a more rounded and fuller rear design.

section4.title: Flagship Cabin Space
section4.subTitle: The cabin size is outstanding among luxury 5-seat SUVs with a body length of 5050mm and a wheelbase of 3005mm. It has larger effective space inside the vehicle and brings a brand-new flagship experience to a family of three.

section5.title: Flagship-Level Comfort
section5.subTitle: The queen seat wraps you in a 270° embrace.

section6.title: Enable the "Queen Seat" mode with one click
section6.subTitle: The electric footrest unfolds automatically. Second-row backrest can adjusted to 40°, and legroom can expand up to 1160mm.
